reference: Zhang, L. (2005). The value premium. Journal of Finance 60(1), 67Ã¢â¬â103.

A. Data Macroeconomic variables Data on the consumption deflator, consumption of non-durables and services and nonresidential investment is from the Bureau of Economic Analysis. Data on the relative price of equipment is from Israelsen (2010). Data on TFP in the consumption sector is from Basu et al. (2006).
